descriptions.en: Scatters steel-colored scales as it flaps its wings. Despite being observed feeding primarily on the nectar of flowers, Mothim is not often seen around flower gardens.
descriptions.ja: 夜中　活発に　飛び回り 眠っている　ミツハニーの　巣から ミツを　奪って　逃げる。
descriptions.it: Vola qua e là di notte per derubare i Combee del loro nettare mentre dormono, e poi fuggire.
descriptions.es: Hace vida nocturna. Revolotea y roba la miel de las colmenas de Combee cuando duermen.
descriptions.de: Nachts fliegt es emsig umher und stiehlt, während Wadribie schläft, Honig aus dessen Nest.
descriptions.fr: Ce Pokémon s’active à la nuit tombée pour voler le miel des Apitrini pendant leur sommeil.
descriptions.ko: 한밤중에 활발하게 날아다니며 잠든 세꿀버리의 둥지에서 꿀을 훔쳐 달아난다.
